name: annotations
title: Annotations
description: Master the art of data annotation with our comprehensive tutorials for all file types

content.description: Learn to create powerful image annotations - from simple boxes to complex segmentation masks, with best practices for AI training and data analysis
Master video annotation techniques - track objects across frames, create temporal annotations, and handle complex motion sequences
Explore text annotation techniques - mark spans, entities, and relationships in documents with precision character-level control
Create and manage AI prompts and responses - build conversational datasets with multi-modal content for advanced AI training
Learn audio annotation techniques - from transcription to sound event detection, with support for timestamps and multiple speakers
Master 3D point cloud annotations - create precise object detection and segmentation in LiDAR scenes with advanced spatial tools
Easily annotate, manage, and export geospatial data using Dataloop's GIS Annotation SDK with full support for bounding boxes, polygons, polylines, and points.
